1537649547_1b9urVTLtAAZAidg6hchWqhrVtYXU.body:
> [thornranger](#comment_13_1CthCNo2eADyWkShCTBTVKGHy3WNXcj6Fh): Couldn't we just avoid having someone else lord over our content by cloning a zite?  Also, I thought all of our content was hosted on our own computers and those sharing/and/or seeding our site?

More or less yes, but whoever holds the private key for a particular zite can push an update to people who have previously downloaded the zite which excludes any arbitrary content or data. This is what allows a zite creator to be able to make improvements to an existing zite without having to change its address or clone it.
